00052 /*
00053   If unsucessful, errn will be set to a platform specific error number, or zero if no
00054   such information is available.  If errn is NULL, the parameter will be ignored.
00055 */
00056 DVDID_API(dvdid_status_t) dvdid_calculate(uint64_t *discid, const char* path, int *errn);
00057 
00058 /* Get a pointer to a string describing the contents of a dvdid_status_t */
